tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have had good experience at family dental, Dr Archana attended to my teeth issues. I had taken oral health for granted till I turned 30, Dr Archana made me realize how important out oral health is for our general health. I felt very comfortable doing my teeth cleaning n root canal treatment, I put a zirconia cap as well, all the treatment went fine. I recommend family dental to all, the staff n doctors are very nice n soft spoken, clinic is neat n clean. 
Thanks

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very good doctor approachable, good listener, solves the problem, i visited for my gum treatment and Rct, the treatment was very good n i am satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi friends, I have been treated by Dr Archana Diwan * *** ** ** ****** ******* ** *** ****** she is gentle, warm n listens patiently to the problems, I found her very good as a person n as a doctor as well. I did teeth whitening n RCT with her, all with great results. The clinic is well maintained n hygenic n has all latest equipment. Recommended üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I stay In horamavu, family dental is very close to my house. But there r so many clinics so I was confused where to go. Then my neighbor suggested Dr Archana Diwan's name. I went there & I am very satisfied by their approach. The way they explain the problem, guide you to take the decision. Very experienced & highly qualified. I am sure anyone looking for dentist, pls go to family dental care horamavu.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am glad to give this review for fdc horamavu, my experience was super smooth, right from beginning to the end. My RCT was done by Dr Diwan, who took care of pain , wisdom tooth extraction was done by a specialist doctor who was good too. Overall a very good clinic for anybody to visit for tooth related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi, I went for wisdom teeth extraction, the surgery was complicated, but doctors took good care of it. I was advised opg and cbct, the surgery was done with utmost care n very professionally. Healing also happened in weeks time. Happy to share this review coz my sister did it elsewhere and the experience was not that great. Dr Diwans family dental care is a good place for all dental problems. Place is neat n clean n well maintained.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Surgical Extractions of Teeth,
review: Great help done during covid times by the doctors @ family dental Horamavu.  They took care of my father who suffered from severe tooth ache . The doctors followed strict protocol with ppe,  and took our temperature,  pulse oximeter,  proper sanitization. Not seen anywhere. I recommend them one hundred percent.
